full_description:
FURGLE Carry Series Racing-Style Gaming Chair White & Red

The FURGLE Carry Series Racing-Style Gaming Chair's components are of the finest quality in the market, meeting European and American standards as well as SGS certification. Long-term sitting will not deform and wear, and can effectively alleviate the fatigue of long-term gaming, thanks to the use of a super-resistant foam sponge, wear-resistant PU leather surface layer, and high-strength steel skeleton with a diameter of up to 22 mm.

Quality Materials & Ergonomics

The FURGLE Carry Series Gaming Chair White & Red is made of a single piece of high-density sponge with a carbon fiber texture. The stain- and fade-resistant PU leather offers maximum comfort and breathability. The robust metal frame bionics offers ergonomic support for the head, waist, and hips. The all-black gaming chair has a traditional appearance. The leather texture is transparent and natural, with a clear and clean texture, exposing its noble and exquisite qualities.

Endurance & Safety

It has a full and durable metal frame, a heavy-duty wheelbase, class 3 hydraulic pistons, and nylon bottom five-star feet. A 3mm thick explosion-proof plate has been placed on the bottom of the cushion to significantly boost safety.

Accessory upgrade

To reduce weariness, the FURGLE Carry Series Gaming Chair White & Red includes a 3D adjustable spinning handrail, thick cushioning, a changeable headrest, and a lumbar pillow. The swivel is equipped with high-quality PU silent wheels that allow it to revolve 360 degrees without harming the floor.

Multi-function & large size

The FURGLE Carry Series Gaming Chair's back may be adjusted 90 to 180 degrees rearward, and the seat height can be changed to improve comfort. You may enjoy rocking in your chair.
